Package index

Data Download Functions

Functions for downloading HCUP resources

download_ccsr()
Download CCSR Mapping Files from HCUP
download_trend_tables()
Download HCUP Summary Trend Tables
list_ccsr_versions()
List Available CCSR Versions
ccsr_changelog()
Get CCSR Change Log

Data Import Functions

Functions for reading downloaded files

read_ccsr()
Read CCSR Mapping Files from Disk
read_trend_table()
Read HCUP Summary Trend Table from Disk
list_trend_table_sheets()
List Available Sheets in Trend Table

Mapping Functions

Functions for mapping ICD-10 codes to CCSR categories

ccsr_map()
Map ICD-10 Codes to CCSR Categories
get_ccsr_description()
Get CCSR Category Descriptions

Utility Functions

Helper functions for citations and utilities

hcup_citation()
Generate Citation for HCUP Resources
